article_title: Marshall wants Kansan on Ag Committee
article_text:
Getting a Kansas representative back on the House Agriculture Committee is a priority for Dr. Roger Marshall, who is seeking the Republican nomination for U.S. representative in the state’s 1st Congressional District.

Login Here to Read More...

article_metadata.author:
TIM HORAN
Salina Journal
